body:
Begin Tran;

-- 1️⃣ Geçici tabloya al
Select  * Into  #Tmp_ObjectsVeriIslemleri From  dbo.RN100_ObjectsVeriIslemleri Where ITVeriIslemID = 18;
--Select  * Into  Tmp_ObjectsVeriIslemleri18 From  dbo.RN100_ObjectsVeriIslemleri Where ITVeriIslemID = 18;


-- 2️⃣ Asıl tablodan sil
Delete  From dbo.RN100_ObjectsVeriIslemleri Where   ITVeriIslemID = 18;

Set Identity_Insert dbo.RN100_ObjectsVeriIslemleri On

-- 3️⃣ Tekrar ekle (ID identity ise yeni ID alacak)
Insert Into dbo.RN100_ObjectsVeriIslemleri (ITVeriIslemID, ITObjectID, SPITObjectID, SiraNo, VeriIslemAdi, IsBeginGroup
                                          , DSITObjectID, SFilterFieldName, DFilterFieldName, ITGroupName, IsOnay
                                          , DSITObjectID2, AddDate, AddUser, UpdateDate, UpdateUser, IsRaporExcute
                                          , IsLookupRequery, SPITObjectIDWhereText, DSITWhereText, DS2ITWhereText
                                          , ITShortCutID, IsITUpdate, SDFieldsForLocate, AnalizDataID, IsMultiSelect
                                          , LangDicID, ITObjectItemGroupID, IsDSRequery, ShowInTab, VeriIslemTypeID
                                          , IconName, ConfirmationMessage, StyleId)
Select  ITVeriIslemID, ITObjectID, SPITObjectID, SiraNo, VeriIslemAdi, IsBeginGroup, DSITObjectID, SFilterFieldName
      , DFilterFieldName, ITGroupName, IsOnay, DSITObjectID2, AddDate, AddUser, UpdateDate, UpdateUser, IsRaporExcute
      , IsLookupRequery, SPITObjectIDWhereText, DSITWhereText, DS2ITWhereText, ITShortCutID, IsITUpdate
      , SDFieldsForLocate, AnalizDataID, IsMultiSelect, LangDicID, ITObjectItemGroupID, IsDSRequery, ShowInTab
      , VeriIslemTypeID, IconName, ConfirmationMessage, StyleId
From    #Tmp_ObjectsVeriIslemleri;

Set Identity_Insert dbo.RN100_ObjectsVeriIslemleri Off

Drop Table #Tmp_ObjectsVeriIslemleri;

Commit Tran;
